p: Favipiravir is an antiviral drug approved for the treatment of influenza in Japan due to its activity against a wide spectrum of RNA viruses including coronaviruses [ 11]. This drug can effectively inhibit RdRp and has been reported to have activity against SARS-CoV-2 [ 4]. There are various ongoing trials with favipiravir and it has also been approved for use in multiple countries ( ClinicalTrials.gov identifiers: NCT04351295, NCT04346628, NCT04392973, NCT04387760, NCT04425460, NCT04359615, NCT04445467, NCT04358549, NCT04349241, NCT04310228, NCT04373733, NCT04333589) [ 47].
